actions.text: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.

Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Portman. (consideration: CR S610-611; text: CR S610) To clarify that child victims of sex trafficking are eligible to receive assistance under grants provided to enhance the safety of youth and children.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 10 proposed by Senator Portman.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 10 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 100 - 0. Record Vote Number: 16.

purpose: To clarify that child victims of sex trafficking are eligible to receive assistance under grants provided to enhance the safety of youth and children.
